name: Eggpert control
description:
Submission for GMTK Game jam 2020 - Out of Control

You play as a new recruit to out of control farm, where chaos reigns. You have to collect the eggs to deliver as soon as possible

Perform Action - Click on house

Move camera - Arrow keys

Gameplay is similar to idle clicker game where you can upgrade as you gain more experience and achieve your task a lot quicker.
